2063.subject: SBS
2063.descrlong: An archaeological field school and project-based learning lab in archaeology, history, and archival research methods. Participants explore the archaeology and history of an early California mission community of the Central Coast by way of the hands-on study of archaeological and historical collections pertaining to San Juan Bautista. In addition, participants conduct archaeological excavations within the 200-year old mission and community of San Juan Bautista. Formerly known as SBSC 260S.
